title: Please help me, kernal not working
body:
Is anyone else having problems with the kernal not loading the client? It was working fine yesterday. The client hasn't loaded the entire day. 
When i troubleshoot it shows that it isnt compatible. I dont know what could of changed from yesterday to today that makes my computer incompatible with the kernal.

replies.body:
I've been having the same problem for over a week now. 
I did a small bit of research and it looks like my computer (could be yours too, I don't know for sure) didn't have the right proxy settings.
It looks like this whole thing is a network connectivity issue, somewhere between our rig and the servers.
I disabled my Network Adapter then turned it back on. 
Next time I tried to launch League it worked perfectly, no problems at all.
Hope it helps!

The kernel errors are usually caused by permissions problems preventing the patcher from launching.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings to allow the game to launch.  Let me know if you have any questions!
